main event: A circular object with a white or red/yellow fringe was observed for 13 minutes in Yellow Springs, Ohio on 7 June 1958.
interesting points: The object flickered and appeared as a disc,The observer described the object's maneuvers as typical for unidentified aerial phenomena in the Springfield area,The observation lasted for approximately 13 minutes,The object was seen moving in a circular path,The observer was scanning the sky for a particular star when they noticed the object.
sighted object: circular object with white and yellow/red fringe
witness description: Senior, majoring in Physics, Age 23, Male
